quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: With realization of one’s own potential and self-confidence in one’s ability, one can build a better world.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: If you can’t yet do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Never say never, because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Do not wait for the perfect time and place to enter, for you are already onstage.
author: Unknown

quote: Arise! Awake! And stop not until the goal is reached.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: उद्धरेदात्मनात्मानम् नात्मानमवसादयेत्। आत्मैव ह्यात्मनो बन्धुरात्मैव रिपुरात्मनः॥
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: सा विद्या या विमुक्तये।
author: Chanakya Niti

quote: उत्तिष्ठत जाग्रत प्राप्य वरान्निबोधत।
author: Kathopanishad

quote: सत्यमेव जयते।
author: Mundaka Upanishad

quote: यत्र नार्यस्तु पूज्यन्ते रमन्ते तत्र देवताः।
author: Manusmriti

quote: I am exactly where I am meant to be.
author: Anonymous

quote: I radiate love and positivity.
author: Anonymous

quote: I am worthy of love and respect.
author: Anonymous

quote: I am a magnet for positive outcomes and experiences.
author: Anonymous

quote: I am grateful for the gift of today and make it count.
author: Anonymous

quote: Every day is full of potential, and I am open to new opportunities.
author: Anonymous

quote: I trust myself to make the right decisions.
author: Anonymous

quote: I am an unstoppable force of nature.
author: Anonymous

quote: I attract positivity and repel negativity.
author: Anonymous

quote: I create my own opportunities.
author: Anonymous

quote: अहमस्मि सम्पूर्णम्।
author: Anonymous

quote: यत् भावो तत् भवति।
author: Anonymous

quote: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि।
author: Anonymous

quote: अनुगच्छतु प्रवाहम्।
author: Anonymous

quote: सा विद्या या विमुक्तये।
author: Anonymous

quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides a champion from someone who is not a champion.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow.
author: Jay Cutler

quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Your body can stand almost anything. It’s your mind that you have to convince.
author: Andrew Murphy

quote: The only bad workout is the one you didn’t do.
author: Anonymous

quote: You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Anonymous

quote: Sweat is fat crying.
author: Anonymous

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Fall in love with taking care of yourself: mind, body, spirit.
author: Anonymous

quote: व्यायामात् लभते स्वास्थ्यं दीर्घायुष्यं बलं सुखं।
author: Anonymous

quote: शरीरोपचयः कान्तिर्गात्राणां सुविभक्तता।
author: Anonymous

quote: न चास्ति सदृशं तेन किंचित्स्थौल्यापकर्षणम्।
author: Anonymous

quote: व्यायामं कुर्वतो नित्यं विरुद्धमपि भोजनम्।
author: Anonymous

quote: आदित्यस्य नमस्कारान्ये कुर्वन्ति दिने दिने।
author: Anonymous

quote: श्रमक्लमपिपासोष्णशीतादीनां सहिष्णुता।
author: Anonymous

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: A great marriage is not when the 'perfect couple' comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
author: Dave Meurer

quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
author: T. Tolis

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao-Tzu

quote: Trust is the fruit of a relationship in which you know you are loved.
author: William Paul Young

quote: We cannot really love anyone with whom we never laugh.
author: Agnes Repplier

quote: Love doesn’t make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: A loving relationship is one in which the loved one is free to be himself.
author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quote: Happily ever after is not a fairy tale; it’s a choice.
author: Fawn Weaver

quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
author: Carl Gustav Jung

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: To get the full value of joy, you must have someone to divide it with.
author: Mark Twain

quote: प्रेम सर्वान् जयति।
author: Anonymous

quote: यत्र नार्यस्तु पूज्यन्ते रमन्ते तत्र देवताः।
author: Anonymous

quote: सत्यमेव प्रेम शाश्वतम्।
author: Anonymous

quote: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement; nothing can be done without hope.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Be positive. Your mind is more powerful than you think.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: You’re off to great places, today is your day. Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
author: Les Brown

quote: Train your mind to see the good in every situation.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you can stay positive in a negative situation, you win.
author: Anonymous

quote: सर्वे भवन्तु सुखिनः।
author: Anonymous

quote: आत्मनं विद्धि।
author: Anonymous

quote: सुखस्य मूलं धर्मः।
author: Anonymous

quote: अहिंसा परमो धर्मः।
author: Anonymous

quote: यत्र धर्मस्तत्र जयः।
author: Anonymous
